item.title: [NOVIS] Nova Iron & Steel Ltd. Announces Q3 and Nine Months Unaudited Financial Results for 2025
item.description:

item.title: [SHIVAGR] Shivagrico Implements Ltd Appoints Mr. Arvind Joshi and Mrs. Kavita Jain as Additional Directors
item.description:
Shivagrico Implements Ltd has appointed Mr. Arvind Joshi and Mrs. Kavita Jain as additional directors designated as Non-Executive Independent Directors. The appointments are for a tenure of five years commencing from 26th February, 2026, subject to the approval of shareholders at their ensuing general meeting. The company has also appointed M/S Sharma Umesh & Co. Chartered Accountant as an Internal Auditor for the financial year 2025-2026. Ms. Priyanka Shah has resigned from the post of Non-Executive Independent Director with effect from 26th February, 2026.

  • Appointment of Mr. Arvind Joshi as Additional Director
  • Appointment of Mrs. Kavita Jain as Additional Director
  • Appointment of M/S Sharma Umesh & Co. Chartered Accountant as Internal Auditor
  • Resignation of Ms. Priyanka Shah as Non-Executive Independent Director

item.title: [ATFL] Dr. Om Prakash Manchanda Resigns as Independent Director of Sundrop Brands Ltd
item.description:
Dr. Om Prakash Manchanda has resigned as the Independent Director of Sundrop Brands Ltd (formerly known as Agro Tech Foods Limited) due to his enhanced professional commitments. His resignation will be effective from February 27, 2026. Dr. Manchanda has also stepped down from all the relevant Committees of the Board of Directors. The Board has expressed its gratitude for his contributions and guidance during his tenure.

item.title: [AADHARHFC] Blackstone Acquires Control of Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd with 28.28 Crore Shares
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd informs about a change in control of the company. BCP Topco VII Pte. Ltd., the promoter of the company, entered into a share purchase agreement with BCP Asia Il Holdco VII Pte. Ltd. on July 25, 2025. The agreement stated that BCP Asia Il Holdco VII Pte. Ltd. would acquire up to 28,20,52,121 equity shares of the company at a price not exceeding Rs. 425.00 per equity share. The acquisition has been completed on February 25, 2026. Post the acquisition, BCP Asia Il Holdco VII Pte. Ltd. now holds 28,27,88,827 equity shares of the company and has been classified as a 'Promoter' of the company. The Seller and the current promoter group have ceased to be the 'promoter' and members of the 'promoter group' of the company.

  • Blackstone's BCP Asia Il Holdco VII Pte. Ltd. has acquired 28,20,52,121 equity shares of Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd.
  • The acquisition has been completed on February 25, 2026.
  • BCP Asia Il Holdco VII Pte. Ltd. now holds 28,27,88,827 equity shares of the company and has been classified as a 'Promoter'.
  • The Seller and the current promoter group have ceased to be the 'promoter' and members of the 'promoter group' of the company.
  • AXDI LDII SPV 1 LTD has acquired 44,139,236 equity shares of the company on February 26, 2026.

item.title: [OMAXE] Omaxe Ltd Approves Allotment of Rs. 18,50,00,000 Unrated Senior Secured Non-Convertible Debentures
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Omaxe Ltd has approved the allotment of 185 Unrated Senior Secured Non-Convertible Debentures of face value of Rs.10,00,000 each, amounting to Rs. 18,50,00,000 on Private Placement basis. This is the third tranche of the total 1,994 NCDs having a face value of Rs. 10,00,000 each, amounting to Rs. 199.40 Crore. The NCDs will be redeemed in full at the end of the Tenor for an amount equal to the Issue Price plus the amount of Committed Return and additional return (if any). The charge/security created over the assets include an exclusive first charge by way of mortgage over the project land, leasehold rights, and development share, and an exclusive first charge by way of hypothecation over all bank accounts, receivables and over all current and non-current assets, both tangible and intangible, of the Project.

  • Omaxe Ltd approves allotment of Rs. 18,50,00,000 Unrated Senior Secured Non-Convertible Debentures

item.title: [TATACOMM] Tata Communications Ltd Announces Dissolution of Wholly Owned Indirect Subsidiary BUC Mobile, Inc.
item.description:
Tata Communications Ltd has informed about the dissolution of its wholly owned indirect subsidiary, BUC Mobile, Inc., which was domiciled in Delaware, United States of America. The dissolution was effective from February 16, 2026, following the completion of requisite filings with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware. The subsidiary did not contribute any amount to the turnover or revenue or income and net worth of the company in the last financial year.

  • Tata Communications Ltd announces the dissolution of its wholly owned indirect subsidiary, BUC Mobile, Inc.
  • The dissolution was effective from February 16, 2026.
  • BUC Mobile, Inc. was domiciled in Delaware, United States of America.
  • The dissolution followed the completion of requisite filings with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware.
  • BUC Mobile, Inc. did not contribute to the turnover or revenue or income and net worth of the company in the last financial year.

item.title: [CUPID] Cupid Limited Receives Disclosure from Promoter Aditya Kumar Halwasiya under SEBI Regulations
item.description:
Cupid Limited has received a disclosure from its Promoter and Chairman, Mr. Aditya Kumar Halwasiya, in compliance with Regulation 29(2) of the SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations, 2011. The disclosure pertains to the acquisition of 2,27,000 equity shares of Cupid Limited in the open market. The total voting rights of Mr. Halwasiya before and after the acquisition are 32.70% and 32.71% respectively.

  • Cupid Limited receives disclosure from Promoter Aditya Kumar Halwasiya under SEBI regulations.
  • Disclosure is in compliance with Regulation 29(2) of SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations, 2011.
  • Aditya Kumar Halwasiya acquires 2,27,000 equity shares of Cupid Limited in the open market.
  • Before the acquisition, Mr. Halwasiya's voting rights were 32.70%. After the acquisition, his voting rights increased to 32.71%.
  • Cupid Limited is listed on BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange Limited.
